Uses of Class
org.springframework.context.support.AbstractXmlApplicationContext

Packages that use AbstractXmlApplicationContext
org.springframework.context.support Classes supporting the org.springframework.context package, such as abstract base classes for ApplicationContext implementations and a MessageSource implementation. 
 

Uses of AbstractXmlApplicationContext in org.springframework.context.support
 

Subclasses of AbstractXmlApplicationContext in org.springframework.context.support
